notes: Cycle-accurate emulation with x64sc; also available as vice_x64 core for faster but less accurate emulation
Windows-only cycle-exact emulator; settings stored in Windows registry or hoxs64.ini
Cycle-accurate macOS-native emulator; uses workspace bundles for save states
Scala-based emulator; also emulates C128 VIC20 CBM2 and SuperCPU
Based on VICE; supports save states; available on Google Play
Based on VICE; available on F-Droid; includes built-in games and time-machine feature
